mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of John Booth
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of John Booth John Walters, Guardian, until ward became 21 by 03.11.1890 Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 117, in the Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
